DOC.brief_summary: This is a phase I study to analyze the effect of water and food intake on the bioavailability and pharmacodynamic of oral salmon calcitonin (SMC021) and salmon calcitonin nasal spray in post-menopausal women.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Water and Food Intake on the Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of Oral Salmon Calcitonin in Healthy Postmenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Healthy postmenopausal women Previous treatment with other osteoporosis medication Other protocol defined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply.
